descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][img]http://i.imgur.com/JQ4bIHu.png[/img]

[color=#1e84cc][b]About this mod[/b][/color][/b][/size][b]

[size=4]This mod is a standalone replacement of Sylgja of Shor's Stone. Her body is UNP, but if requested I may make other body options.

Note: If this is not for you, move on. Don't waste your time with rude comments. It is against the site rules.[/size]


[color=#1e84cc][b][size=5]Who is she?[/size][/b][/color]

[size=4] Daughter of Verner Rock-Chucker and Annekke Crag-Jumper, Sylgja resides in the tiny mining village (if you can call it that) of Shor's Stone. She recently had suffered from a nasty injury, but has slowly been on the mend. She is proud of being a miner and will often chat about cracking rocks. [/size]

[color=#1e84cc][b][size=5]~Now A Follower~[/size][/b][/color]
[size=4]
With this mod installed Sylgja can now be recruited as a follower, but she still will not be a marriage candidate until you complete her little quest.

-Also she will now level along side you.
[/size]

[color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]~Requirements~[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]Latest version of Skyrim[/size][size=4]

[/size]
[color=#1e84cc][size=5][b]~Compatibility~[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]Compatible with everything except mods that alter Sylgja.[/size]


[color=#1e84cc][size=5]~Installation~[/size][/color][/b]

[size=4]Install using NMM or mod manager of choice.

Manual Install:

Extract files to Skyrim Data folder.[/size]


[b][color=#1e84cc][size=5]~Credits[/size]~[/color]

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563/?]Coverwomen[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
SG Hairs
